page.title: 03COWLEYMOOR HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: Cowleymoor is situated on the northern outskirts of{Tiverton.}The area is a typical{housing estate}with about{400 houses}and{2 schools.}Most of the houses are made of pre-fabricated{concrete.}Some houses are{36 years old.}Most of these houses are council property and are a bit crumbly and old. The rest of the buildings are privately owned houses. They were built in{1935}and are{50 years old. The private houses and council houses are mixed. One hundred years ago there were fields and moorlands,hence the name {Cowleymoor.}The rest of the area is {farmed grassland}owned by{Knightshayes {Estate.} We think in the future the estate will be replaced with new houses.
